text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> ohngebunden <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>12. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":8,"explanation":"Fixed the following issues: (1) Corrected Unicode escape sequences for special characters (√ü → ü, √§ → ä, √† → removed spurious character) to proper German umlauts and characters; (2) Standardized FORMAT tags from \"8v√≤.\" to \"8vo.\" for consistency; (3) Changed one inconsistent PRICE tag to PRIZE to match the rest of the document; (4) Removed a nested BIBL tag that was improperly wrapping the Maupertuis entry - restructured it as a separate BIBL element; (5) Fixed the \"Gespräch\" title by correcting the Unicode escape sequences to proper German characters; (6) Removed spurious Unicode characters (√†) that appeared between text elements; (7) Ensured all BIBL entries are properly closed and at the same hierarchical level; (8) Maintained all semantic content while improving XML well-formedness."}

parsed.explanation: Fixed the following issues: (1) Corrected Unicode escape sequences for special characters (√ü → ü, √§ → ä, √† → removed spurious character) to proper German umlauts and characters; (2) Standardized FORMAT tags from "8v√≤." to "8vo." for consistency; (3) Changed one inconsistent PRICE tag to PRIZE to match the rest of the document; (4) Removed a nested BIBL tag that was improperly wrapping the Maupertuis entry - restructured it as a separate BIBL element; (5) Fixed the "Gespräch" title by correcting the Unicode escape sequences to proper German characters; (6) Removed spurious Unicode characters (√†) that appeared between text elements; (7) Ensured all BIBL entries are properly closed and at the same hierarchical level; (8) Maintained all semantic content while improving XML well-formedness.
